00610 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00612 //

00615 
00616 class SC_API sc_fxnum
00617 {
00618     friend class sc_fxval;
00619

00625     friend class sc_fxnum_fast_subref;
00626 
00627     friend class sc_core::vcd_sc_fxnum_trace;
00628     friend class sc_core::wif_sc_fxnum_trace;
00629 
00630 protected:
00631 
00632     sc_fxnum_observer* observer() const;
00633 
00634 
00635     void cast();
00636 
00637 
00638     // constructors
00639 
00640     sc_fxnum( const sc_fxtype_params&,
00641               sc_enc,
00642               const sc_fxcast_switch&,
00643               sc_fxnum_observer* );
00644 
00645 #define DECL_CTOR_T(tp)                                                       \
00646     sc_fxnum( tp,                                                             \
00647               const sc_fxtype_params&,                                        \
00648               sc_enc,                                                         \
00649               const sc_fxcast_switch&,                                        \
00650               sc_fxnum_observer* );
00651 
00652     DECL_CTOR_T(int)
00653     DECL_CTOR_T(unsigned int)
00654     DECL_CTOR_T(long)
00655     DECL_CTOR_T(unsigned long)
00656     DECL_CTOR_T(float)
00657     DECL_CTOR_T(double)
00658     DECL_CTOR_T(const char*)
00659     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_fxval&)
00660     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_fxval_fast&)
00661     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_fxnum&)
00662     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_fxnum_fast&)
00663 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00664     DECL_CTOR_T(int64)
00665     DECL_CTOR_T(uint64)
00666     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_int_base&)
00667     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_uint_base&)

00669     DECL_CTOR_T(const sc_unsigned&)
00670 #endif
00671 
00672 #undef DECL_CTOR_T
00673 
00674     ~sc_fxnum();
00675 
00676 
00677     // internal use only;

01238     // relational (including equality) operators
01239 
01240 #define DECL_REL_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
01241     friend bool operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast&, tp );                     \
01242     friend bool operator op ( tp, const sc_fxnum_fast& );
01243 
01244 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01245 #define DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
01246     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,int64)                                                   \
01247     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                  \
01248     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
01249     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
01250     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                        \
01251     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
01252 #else
01253 #define DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)
01254 #endif
01255 
01256 #define DECL_REL_OP(op)                                                       \
01257     friend bool operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast&, const sc_fxnum_fast& );   \
01258     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,int)                                                     \
01259     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                            \
01260     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,long)                                                    \
01261     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                           \
01262     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,float)                                                  \
01263     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,double)                                                  \
01264     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const char*)                                             \
01265     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
01266     DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)
01267 
01268     DECL_REL_OP(<)
01269     DECL_REL_OP(<=)
01270     DECL_REL_OP(>)
01271     DECL_REL_OP(>=)
01272     DECL_REL_OP(==)
01273     DECL_REL_OP(!=)
01274 
01275 #undef DECL_REL_OP_T
01276 #undef DECL_REL_OP_OTHER
01277 #undef DECL_REL_OP
01278 
01279 
01280     // assignment operators
01281 
01282 #define DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
01283     sc_fxnum_fast& operator op( tp );
01284 
01285 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01286 #define DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
01287     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,int64)                                                   \
01288     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                  \
01289     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
01290     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
01291     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                        \
01292     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
01293 #else
01294 #define DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
01295 #endif
01296 
01297 #define DECL_ASN_OP(op)                                                       \
01298     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,int)                                                     \
01299     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                            \
01300     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,long)                                                    \
01301     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                           \
01302     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,float)                                                  \
01303     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,double)                                                  \
01304     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const char*)                                             \
01305     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxval&)                                         \
01306     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
01307     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxnum&)                                         \
01308     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxnum_fast&)                                    \
01309     DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
01310 
01311     DECL_ASN_OP(=)
01312 
01313     DECL_ASN_OP(*=)
01314     DECL_ASN_OP(/=)
01315     DECL_ASN_OP(+=)
01316     DECL_ASN_OP(-=)
01317 
01318     DECL_ASN_OP_T(<<=,int)
01319     DECL_ASN_OP_T(>>=,int)
01320 
01321 #undef DECL_ASN_OP_T
01322 #undef DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER
01323 #undef DECL_ASN_OP
01324 
01325 
01326     // auto-increment and auto-decrement
01327 
01328     const sc_fxval_fast operator ++ ( int );
01329     const sc_fxval_fast operator -- ( int );
01330 
01331     sc_fxnum_fast& operator ++ ();
01332     sc_fxnum_fast& operator -- ();
01333

01339

01341     sc_fxnum_fast_bitref   bit( int );

01357     sc_fxnum_fast_subref       range();

01385     const std::string to_string( sc_numrep, sc_fmt ) const;

01526 inline
01527 sc_fxnum_bitref&
01528 sc_fxnum_bitref::operator = ( const sc_fxnum_bitref& a )
01529 {
01530     if( &a != this )
01531     {
01532         SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a.m_num )
01533         set( a.get() );
01534         SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )
01535     }
01536     return *this;
01537 }

01540 sc_fxnum_bitref&

01544     set( a.get() );
01545     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )
01546     return *this;
01547 }

01555     return *this;
01556 }

01564     return *this;

01903 {
01904     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )
01905     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b.m_num )
01906     set( get() != b.get() );
01907     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )
01908     return *this;
01909 }
01910 
01911 inline
01912 sc_fxnum_fast_bitref&
01913 sc_fxnum_fast_bitref::operator ^= ( const sc_bit& b )
01914 {
01915     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )
01916     set( get() != static_cast<bool>( b ) );
01917     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )
01918     return *this;
01919 }
01920 
01921 inline
01922 sc_fxnum_fast_bitref&
01923 sc_fxnum_fast_bitref::operator ^= ( bool b )
01924 {
01925     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )
01926     set( get() != b );
01927     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )
01928     return *this;
01929 }
01930

01934 operator >> ( ::std::istream& is, sc_fxnum_fast_bitref& a )
01935 {
01936     a.scan( is );
01937     return is;
01938 }

02593 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_signed&)

02595 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_int_base&)
02596 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_uint_base&)
02597 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int64)
02598 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(uint64)
02599 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int)
02600 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned int)
02601 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(long)
02602 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned long)
02603 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(char)
02604 
02605 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
02606 
02607 
02608 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
02609 inline                                                                        \
02610 sc_fxnum_fast_subref&                                                         \
02611 sc_fxnum_fast_subref::operator op ## = ( tp a )                               \
02612 {                                                                             \
02613     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )                                     \
02614     get();                                                                    \
02615     m_bv = m_bv op a;                                                         \
02616     set();                                                                    \
02617     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )                                    \
02618     return *this;                                                             \
02619 }
02620 
02621 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op)                                                       \
02622 inline                                                                        \
02623 sc_fxnum_fast_subref&                                                         \
02624 sc_fxnum_fast_subref::operator op ## = ( const sc_fxnum_subref& a )           \
02625 {                                                                             \
02626     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )                                     \
02627     get();                                                                    \
02628     m_bv = m_bv op static_cast<sc_bv_base>( a );                              \
02629     set();                                                                    \
02630     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )                                    \
02631     return *this;                                                             \
02632 }                                                                             \
02633                                                                               \
02634 inline                                                                        \
02635 sc_fxnum_fast_subref&                                                         \
02636 sc_fxnum_fast_subref::operator op ## = ( const sc_fxnum_fast_subref& a )      \
02637 {                                                                             \
02638     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( m_num )                                     \
02639     get();                                                                    \
02640     m_bv = m_bv op static_cast<sc_bv_base>( a );                              \
02641     set();                                                                    \
02642     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( m_num )                                    \
02643     return *this;                                                             \
02644 }                                                                             \
02645                                                                               \
02646 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_bv_base&)                                           \
02647 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_lv_base&)
02648 
02649 DEFN_ASN_OP(&)
02650 DEFN_ASN_OP(|)
02651 DEFN_ASN_OP(^)
02652 
02653 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
02654 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP
02655 
02656 
02657 inline
02658 ::std::istream&
02659 operator >> ( ::std::istream& is, sc_fxnum_fast_subref& a )
02660 {
02661     a.scan( is );
02662     return is;
02663 }

02665 
02666 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02667 //  CLASS : sc_fxnum
02668 //
02669 //  Base class for the fixed-point types; arbitrary precision.
02670 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02671 
02672 inline
02673 sc_fxnum_observer*
02674 sc_fxnum::observer() const
02675 {
02676     return m_observer;
02677 }
02678 
02679 
02680 inline
02681 void
02682 sc_fxnum::cast()
02683 {
02684     SC_ERROR_IF_( ! m_rep->is_normal(), sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_FX_VALUE_ );
02685 
02686     if( m_params.cast_switch() == SC_ON )
02687         m_rep->cast( m_params, m_q_flag, m_o_flag );
02688 }
02689 
02690 
02691 // constructors
02692 
02693 inline
02694 sc_fxnum::sc_fxnum( const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,
02695                     sc_enc enc_,
02696                     const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw,
02697                     sc_fxnum_observer* observer_ )
02698 : m_rep( new scfx_rep ),
02699   m_params( type_params_, enc_, cast_sw ),
02700   m_q_flag( false ),
02701   m_o_flag( false ),
02702   m_observer( observer_ )
02703 {
02704     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
02705     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
02706 }
02707 
02708 #define DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,arg)                                                   \
02709 inline                                                                        \
02710 sc_fxnum::sc_fxnum( tp a,                                                     \
02711                     const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,                     \
02712                     sc_enc enc_,                                              \
02713                     const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw,                          \
02714                     sc_fxnum_observer* observer_ )                            \
02715 : m_rep( new scfx_rep( arg ) ),                                               \
02716   m_params( type_params_, enc_, cast_sw ),                                    \
02717   m_q_flag( false ),                                                          \
02718   m_o_flag( false ),                                                          \
02719   m_observer( observer_ )                                                     \
02720 {                                                                             \
02721     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_                                                \
02722     cast();                                                                   \
02723     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )                                     \
02724     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
02725 }
02726 
02727 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_A(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a)
02728 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_B(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,*a.m_rep)
02729 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_C(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.to_double())
02730 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_D(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.value())
02731 
02732 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int)
02733 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned int)
02734 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(long)
02735 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned long)
02736 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(float)
02737 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(double)
02738 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const char*)
02739 DEFN_CTOR_T_B(const sc_fxval&)
02740 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxval_fast&)
02741 DEFN_CTOR_T_B(const sc_fxnum&)
02742 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxnum_fast&)
02743 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
02744 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int64)
02745 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(uint64)
02746 DEFN_CTOR_T_D(const sc_int_base&)
02747 DEFN_CTOR_T_D(const sc_uint_base&)
02748 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const sc_signed&)
02749 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const sc_unsigned&)
02750 #endif
02751 
02752 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T
02753 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_A
02754 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_B
02755 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_C
02756 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_D
02757 
02758 
02759 inline
02760 sc_fxnum::~sc_fxnum()
02761 {
02762     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_DESTRUCT_( *this )
02763     delete m_rep;
02764 }
02765 
02766 
02767 // internal use only;
02768 inline
02769 const scfx_rep*
02770 sc_fxnum::get_rep() const
02771 {
02772     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02773     return m_rep;
02774 }
02775 
02776 
02777 // unary operators
02778 
02779 inline
02780 const sc_fxval
02781 sc_fxnum::operator - () const
02782 {
02783     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02784     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::neg_scfx_rep( *m_rep ) );
02785 }
02786 
02787 inline
02788 const sc_fxval
02789 sc_fxnum::operator + () const
02790 {
02791     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02792     return sc_fxval( new scfx_rep( *m_rep ) );
02793 }
02794 
02795 
02796 // unary functions
02797 
02798 inline
02799 void
02800 neg( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxnum& a )
02801 {
02802     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02803     c.set_rep( sc_dt::neg_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep ) );
02804 }
02805 
02806 inline
02807 void
02808 neg( sc_fxnum& c, const sc_fxnum& a )
02809 {
02810     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02811     delete c.m_rep;
02812     c.m_rep = sc_dt::neg_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep );
02813     c.cast();
02814     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
02815 }
02816 
02817 
02818 // binary operators
02819 
02820 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
02821 inline                                                                        \
02822 const sc_fxval                                                                \
02823 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, tp b )                                       \
02824 {                                                                             \
02825     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
02826     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
02827     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.get_rep() ) );  \
02828 }                                                                             \
02829                                                                               \
02830 inline                                                                        \
02831 const sc_fxval                                                                \
02832 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxnum& b )                                       \
02833 {                                                                             \
02834     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
02835     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
02836     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.get_rep(), *b.m_rep ) );  \
02837 }
02838 
02839 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
02840 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)                                             \
02841 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,int64)                                                   \
02842 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,uint64)                                                  \
02843 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
02844 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
02845 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_signed&)                                        \
02846 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
02847 #else
02848 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
02849 #endif
02850 
02851 #define DEFN_BIN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
02852 inline                                                                        \
02853 const sc_fxval                                                                \
02854 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxnum& b )                          \
02855 {                                                                             \
02856     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
02857     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
02858     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );        \
02859 }                                                                             \
02860                                                                               \
02861 inline                                                                        \
02862 const sc_fxval                                                                \
02863 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxval& b )                          \
02864 {                                                                             \
02865     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
02866     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.get_rep() ) );    \
02867 }                                                                             \
02868                                                                               \
02869 inline                                                                        \
02870 const sc_fxval                                                                \
02871 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxnum& b )                          \
02872 {                                                                             \
02873     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
02874     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.get_rep(), *b.m_rep ) );    \
02875 }                                                                             \
02876                                                                               \
02877 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,int)                                                     \
02878 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned int)                                            \
02879 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,long)                                                    \
02880 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned long)                                           \
02881 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,float)                                                  \
02882 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,double)                                                  \
02883 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const char*)                                             \
02884 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
02885 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxnum_fast&)                                    \
02886 DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
02887 
02888 DEFN_BIN_OP(*,mult)
02889 DEFN_BIN_OP(+,add)
02890 DEFN_BIN_OP(-,sub)
02891 // don't use macros
02892 //DEFN_BIN_OP(/,div)
02893 inline
02894 const sc_fxval
02895 operator / ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxnum& b )
02896 {
02897     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02898     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
02899     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::div_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );
02900 }
02901 
02902 inline
02903 const sc_fxval
02904 operator / ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxval& b )
02905 {
02906     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02907     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::div_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.get_rep() ) );
02908 }
02909 
02910 inline
02911 const sc_fxval
02912 operator / ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxnum& b )
02913 {
02914     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
02915     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::div_scfx_rep( *a.get_rep(), *b.m_rep ) );
02916 }
02917 
02918 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,int)
02919 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,unsigned int)
02920 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,long)
02921 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,unsigned long)
02922 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,float)
02923 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,double)
02924 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const char*)

02926 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
02927 //DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(/,div)
02928 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER

02930 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,uint64)
02931 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_int_base&)
02932 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_uint_base&)
02933 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_signed&)
02934 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_unsigned&)
02935 #endif
02936 
02937 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_T
02938 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER
02939 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP

02941 
02942 inline
02943 const sc_fxval
02944 operator << ( const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
02945 {
02946     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02947     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::lsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
02948 }
02949 
02950 inline
02951 const sc_fxval
02952 operator >> ( const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
02953 {
02954     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
02955     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::rsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
02956 }

02961 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,tp)                                                \

02965 {                                                                             \
02966     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
02967     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
02968     c.set_rep( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.get_rep() ) );        \
02969 }                                                                             \
02970                                                                               \
02971 inline                                                                        \
02972 void                                                                          \
02973 fnc ( sc_fxval& c, tp a, const sc_fxnum& b )                                  \
02974 {                                                                             \
02975     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
02976     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
02977     c.set_rep( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.get_rep(), *b.m_rep ) );        \
02978 }                                                                             \
02979                                                                               \
02980 inline                                                                        \
02981 void                                                                          \
02982 fnc ( sc_fxnum& c, const sc_fxnum& a, tp b )                                  \
02983 {                                                                             \
02984     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
02985     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
02986     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
02987     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.get_rep() );           \
02988     c.cast();                                                                 \
02989     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
02990 }                                                                             \
02991                                                                               \
02992 inline                                                                        \
02993 void                                                                          \
02994 fnc ( sc_fxnum& c, tp a, const sc_fxnum& b )                                  \
02995 {                                                                             \
02996     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
02997     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
02998     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
02999     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.get_rep(), *b.m_rep );           \
03000     c.cast();                                                                 \
03001     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
03002 }

03012 #else

03014 #endif

03034     c.cast();                                                                 \
03035     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
03036 }                                                                             \

03044 }                                                                             \
03045                                                                               \

03051     c.set_rep( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.get_rep(), *b.m_rep ) );          \
03052 }                                                                             \
03053                                                                               \

03059     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
03060     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.get_rep() );             \
03061     c.cast();                                                                 \
03062     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
03063 }                                                                             \
03064                                                                               \

03068 {                                                                             \
03069     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
03070     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
03071     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.get_rep(), *b.m_rep );             \
03072     c.cast();                                                                 \
03073     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
03074 }                                                                             \
03075                                                                               \

03097 inline
03098 void
03099 lshift( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
03100 {
03101     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03102     c.set_rep( sc_dt::lsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
03103 }
03104 
03105 inline
03106 void
03107 rshift( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
03108 {
03109     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03110     c.set_rep( sc_dt::rsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
03111 }
03112 
03113 inline
03114 void
03115 lshift( sc_fxnum& c, const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
03116 {
03117     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03118     delete c.m_rep;
03119     c.m_rep = sc_dt::lsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b );
03120     c.cast();
03121     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
03122 }
03123 
03124 inline
03125 void
03126 rshift( sc_fxnum& c, const sc_fxnum& a, int b )
03127 {
03128     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03129     delete c.m_rep;
03130     c.m_rep = sc_dt::rsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b );
03131     c.cast();
03132     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
03133 }

03135 
03136 // relational (including equality) operators
03137 
03138 #define DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,tp)                                              \
03139 inline                                                                        \
03140 bool                                                                          \
03141 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, tp b )                                       \
03142 {                                                                             \
03143     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
03144     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
03145     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.get_rep() );            \
03146     return ( ret );                                                           \
03147 }                                                                             \
03148                                                                               \
03149 inline                                                                        \
03150 bool                                                                          \
03151 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxnum& b )                                       \
03152 {                                                                             \
03153     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
03154     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
03155     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *tmp.get_rep(), *b.m_rep );            \
03156     return ( ret );                                                           \
03157 }
03158 
03159 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
03160 #define DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)                                             \
03161 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,int64)                                                   \
03162 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,uint64)                                                  \
03163 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
03164 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
03165 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_signed&)                                        \
03166 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_unsigned&)
03167 #else
03168 #define DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)
03169 #endif
03170 
03171 #define DEFN_REL_OP(op,ret)                                                   \
03172 inline                                                                        \
03173 bool                                                                          \
03174 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxnum& b )                          \
03175 {                                                                             \
03176     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
03177     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
03178     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep );                  \
03179     return ( ret );                                                           \
03180 }                                                                             \
03181                                                                               \
03182 inline                                                                        \
03183 bool                                                                          \
03184 operator op ( const sc_fxnum& a, const sc_fxval& b )                          \
03185 {                                                                             \
03186     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
03187     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.get_rep() );              \
03188     return ( ret );                                                           \
03189 }                                                                             \
03190                                                                               \
03191 inline                                                                        \
03192 bool                                                                          \
03193 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxnum& b )                          \
03194 {                                                                             \
03195     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
03196     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.get_rep(), *b.m_rep );              \
03197     return ( ret );                                                           \
03198 }                                                                             \
03199                                                                               \
03200 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,int)                                                     \
03201 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,unsigned int)                                            \
03202 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,long)                                                    \
03203 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,unsigned long)                                           \
03204 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,float)                                                  \
03205 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,double)                                                  \
03206 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const char*)                                             \
03207 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
03208 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_fxnum_fast&)                                    \
03209 DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)
03210 
03211 DEFN_REL_OP(<,result < 0)
03212 DEFN_REL_OP(<=,result <= 0)
03213 DEFN_REL_OP(>,result > 0 && result != 2)
03214 DEFN_REL_OP(>=,result >= 0 && result != 2)
03215 DEFN_REL_OP(==,result == 0)
03216 DEFN_REL_OP(!=,result != 0)
03217 
03218 #undef DEFN_REL_OP_T
03219 #undef DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER
03220 #undef DEFN_REL_OP
03221 
03222 
03223 // assignment operators
03224 
03225 inline
03226 sc_fxnum&
03227 sc_fxnum::operator = ( const sc_fxnum& a )
03228 {
03229     if( &a != this )
03230     {
03231         SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03232         *m_rep = *a.m_rep;
03233         cast();
03234         SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
03235     }
03236     return *this;
03237 }
03238 
03239 inline
03240 sc_fxnum&
03241 sc_fxnum::operator = ( const sc_fxval& a )
03242 {
03243     *m_rep = *a.get_rep();
03244     cast();
03245     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
03246     return *this;
03247 }
03248 
03249 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(tp)                                                     \
03250 inline                                                                        \
03251 sc_fxnum&                                                                     \
03252 sc_fxnum::operator = ( tp a )                                                 \
03253 {                                                                             \
03254     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
03255     *m_rep = *tmp.get_rep();                                                  \
03256     cast();                                                                   \
03257     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
03258     return *this;                                                             \
03259 }
03260 
03261 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int)
03262 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned int)
03263 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(long)
03264 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned long)
03265 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(float)
03266 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(double)
03267 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const char*)
03268 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxval_fast&)
03269 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxnum_fast&)
03270 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
03271 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int64)
03272 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(uint64)
03273 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_int_base&)
03274 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_uint_base&)
03275 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_signed&)
03276 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_unsigned&)
03277 #endif
03278 
03279 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
03280 
03281 
03282 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
03283 inline                                                                        \
03284 sc_fxnum&                                                                     \
03285 sc_fxnum::operator op ( tp b )                                                \
03286 {                                                                             \
03287     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
03288     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
03289     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *tmp.get_rep() );   \
03290     delete m_rep;                                                             \
03291     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
03292     cast();                                                                   \
03293     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
03294     return *this;                                                             \
03295 }
03296 
03297 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
03298 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)                                             \
03299 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,int64)                                                   \
03300 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,uint64)                                                  \
03301 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
03302 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
03303 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_signed&)                                        \
03304 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
03305 #else
03306 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
03307 #endif
03308 
03309 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
03310 inline                                                                        \
03311 sc_fxnum&                                                                     \
03312 sc_fxnum::operator op ( const sc_fxnum& b )                                   \
03313 {                                                                             \
03314     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
03315     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
03316     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *b.m_rep );         \
03317     delete m_rep;                                                             \
03318     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
03319     cast();                                                                   \
03320     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
03321     return *this;                                                             \
03322 }                                                                             \
03323                                                                               \
03324 inline                                                                        \
03325 sc_fxnum&                                                                     \
03326 sc_fxnum::operator op ( const sc_fxval& b )                                   \
03327 {                                                                             \
03328     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
03329     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *b.get_rep() );     \
03330     delete m_rep;                                                             \
03331     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
03332     cast();                                                                   \
03333     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
03334     return *this;                                                             \
03335 }                                                                             \
03336                                                                               \
03337 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,int)                                                     \
03338 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned int)                                            \
03339 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,long)                                                    \
03340 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned long)                                           \
03341 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,float)                                                  \
03342 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,double)                                                  \
03343 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const char*)                                             \
03344 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
03345 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxnum_fast&)                                    \
03346 DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
03347 
03348 DEFN_ASN_OP(*=,mult)
03349 DEFN_ASN_OP(/=,div)
03350 DEFN_ASN_OP(+=,add)
03351 DEFN_ASN_OP(-=,sub)
03352 
03353 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
03354 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER
03355 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP
03356 
03357 
03358 inline
03359 sc_fxnum&
03360 sc_fxnum::operator <<= ( int b )
03361 {
03362     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
03363     m_rep->lshift( b );
03364     cast();
03365     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
03366     return *this;
03367 }
03368 
03369 inline
03370 sc_fxnum&
03371 sc_fxnum::operator >>= ( int b )
03372 {
03373     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
03374     m_rep->rshift( b );
03375     cast();
03376     SC_FXNUM_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
03377     return *this;
03378 }

03380 
03381 // auto-increment and auto-decrement
03382 
03383 inline
03384 const sc_fxval
03385 sc_fxnum::operator ++ ( int )
03386 {
03387     sc_fxval c( *this );
03388     (*this) += 1;
03389     return c;
03390 }
03391 
03392 inline
03393 const sc_fxval
03394 sc_fxnum::operator -- ( int )
03395 {
03396     sc_fxval c( *this );
03397     (*this) -= 1;
03398     return c;
03399 }
03400 
03401 inline
03402 sc_fxnum&
03403 sc_fxnum::operator ++ ()
03404 {
03405     (*this) += 1;
03406     return *this;
03407 }
03408 
03409 inline
03410 sc_fxnum&
03411 sc_fxnum::operator -- ()
03412 {
03413     (*this) -= 1;
03414     return *this;
03415 }

03421 sc_fxnum_bitref_r
03422 sc_fxnum::operator [] ( int i ) const
03423 {
03424     SC_ERROR_IF_( i < 0 || i >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );
03425     return sc_fxnum_bitref_r( const_cast<sc_fxnum&>( *this ),
03426                             i - m_params.fwl() );
03427 }

03434     return sc_fxnum_bitref( *this, i - m_params.fwl() );
03435 }

03443                             i - m_params.fwl() );

03462     SC_ERROR_IF_( j < 0 || j >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );
03463 
03464     return sc_fxnum_subref_r( const_cast<sc_fxnum&>( *this ),
03465                             i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );
03466 }

03475     return sc_fxnum_subref( *this, i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );

03484 
03485     return sc_fxnum_subref_r( const_cast<sc_fxnum&>( *this ),
03486                             i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );
03487 }
03488

03490 sc_fxnum_subref

03493     SC_ERROR_IF_( i < 0 || i >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );
03494     SC_ERROR_IF_( j < 0 || j >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );

03497 }

03753     else
03754         return m_rep->clear( i, m_params );
03755 }

03793 //  Base class for the fixed-point types; limited precision.

03797 sc_fxnum_fast_observer*
03798 sc_fxnum_fast::observer() const
03799 {
03800     return m_observer;
03801 }
03802 
03803 
03804 // constructors
03805 
03806 inline
03807 sc_fxnum_fast::sc_fxnum_fast( const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,
03808                               sc_enc enc_,
03809                               const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw,
03810                               sc_fxnum_fast_observer* observer_ )
03811 : m_val( 0.0 ),
03812   m_params( type_params_, enc_, cast_sw ),
03813   m_q_flag( false ),
03814   m_o_flag( false ),
03815   m_observer( observer_ )
03816 {
03817     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
03818     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_(*this)
03819 }
03820 
03821 inline
03822 sc_fxnum_fast::sc_fxnum_fast( const sc_fxnum_fast& a,
03823                               const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,
03824                               sc_enc enc_,
03825                               const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw,
03826                               sc_fxnum_fast_observer* observer_ )
03827 : m_val( a.m_val ),
03828   m_params( type_params_, enc_, cast_sw ),
03829   m_q_flag( false ),
03830   m_o_flag( false ),
03831   m_observer( observer_ )
03832 {
03833     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
03834     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03835     cast();
03836     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
03837     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
03838 }
03839 
03840 #define DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,arg)                                                   \
03841 inline                                                                        \
03842 sc_fxnum_fast::sc_fxnum_fast( tp a,                                           \
03843                               const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,           \
03844                               sc_enc enc_,                                    \
03845                               const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw,                \
03846                               sc_fxnum_fast_observer* observer_ )             \
03847 : m_val( arg ),                                                               \
03848   m_params( type_params_, enc_, cast_sw ),                                    \
03849   m_q_flag( false ),                                                          \
03850   m_o_flag( false ),                                                          \
03851   m_observer( observer_ )                                                     \
03852 {                                                                             \
03853     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_                                           \
03854     cast();                                                                   \
03855     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_(*this)                                  \
03856     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
03857 }
03858 
03859 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_A(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,static_cast<double>( a ))
03860 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_B(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,sc_fxval_fast::from_string( a ))
03861 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_C(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.to_double())
03862 
03863 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int)
03864 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned int)
03865 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(long)
03866 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned long)
03867 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(float)
03868 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(double)
03869 DEFN_CTOR_T_B(const char*)
03870 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxval&)
03871 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxval_fast&)
03872 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxnum&)
03873 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
03874 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int64)
03875 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(uint64)
03876 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_int_base&)
03877 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_uint_base&)
03878 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_signed&)
03879 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_unsigned&)
03880 #endif
03881 
03882 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T
03883 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_A
03884 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_B
03885 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_C
03886 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_D
03887 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_E
03888 
03889 
03890 inline
03891 sc_fxnum_fast::~sc_fxnum_fast()
03892 {
03893     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_DESTRUCT_( *this )
03894 }

03896 
03897 // internal use only;
03898 inline
03899 double
03900 sc_fxnum_fast::get_val() const
03901 {
03902     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
03903     return m_val;
03904 }

03906 
03907 // unary operators
03908 
03909 inline
03910 const sc_fxval_fast
03911 sc_fxnum_fast::operator - () const
03912 {
03913     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
03914     return sc_fxval_fast( - m_val );
03915 }
03916 
03917 inline
03918 const sc_fxval_fast
03919 sc_fxnum_fast::operator + () const
03920 {
03921     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
03922     return sc_fxval_fast( m_val );
03923 }
03924 
03925 
03926 // unary functions
03927 
03928 inline
03929 void
03930 neg( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a )
03931 {
03932     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03933     c.set_val( - a.m_val );
03934 }
03935 
03936 inline
03937 void
03938 neg( sc_fxnum_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a )
03939 {
03940     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
03941     c.m_val = - a.m_val;
03942     c.cast();
03943     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
03944 }

03947 // binary operators
03948 
03949 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
03950 inline                                                                        \
03951 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
03952 operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, tp b )                                  \
03953 {                                                                             \
03954     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
03955     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
03956     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val op tmp.get_val() );                         \
03957 }                                                                             \
03958                                                                               \
03959 inline                                                                        \
03960 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
03961 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )                                  \
03962 {                                                                             \
03963     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
03964     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
03965     return sc_fxval_fast( tmp.get_val() op b.m_val );                         \
03966 }
03967 
03968 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
03969 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
03970 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,int64)                                                       \
03971 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                      \
03972 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                          \
03973 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                         \
03974 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                            \
03975 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
03976 #else
03977 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)
03978 #endif
03979 
03980 #define DEFN_BIN_OP(op,dummy)                                                 \
03981 inline                                                                        \
03982 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
03983 operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )                \
03984 {                                                                             \
03985     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
03986     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
03987     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val op b.m_val );                               \
03988 }                                                                             \
03989                                                                               \
03990 inline                                                                        \
03991 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
03992 operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )                \
03993 {                                                                             \
03994     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
03995     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val op b.get_val() );                           \
03996 }                                                                             \
03997                                                                               \
03998 inline                                                                        \
03999 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
04000 operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )                \
04001 {                                                                             \
04002     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
04003     return sc_fxval_fast( a.get_val() op b.m_val );                           \
04004 }                                                                             \
04005                                                                               \
04006 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,int)                                                         \
04007 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                                \
04008 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,long)                                                        \
04009 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                               \
04010 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,float)                                                      \
04011 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,double)                                                      \
04012 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const char*)                                                 \
04013 DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)
04014 
04015 DEFN_BIN_OP(*,mult)
04016 DEFN_BIN_OP(+,add)
04017 DEFN_BIN_OP(-,sub)
04018 //DEFN_BIN_OP(/,div)
04019 inline
04020 const sc_fxval_fast
04021 operator / ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )
04022 {
04023     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04024     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
04025     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val / b.m_val );
04026 }
04027 
04028 inline
04029 const sc_fxval_fast
04030 operator / ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )
04031 {
04032     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04033     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val / b.get_val() );
04034 }
04035 
04036 inline
04037 const sc_fxval_fast
04038 operator / ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )
04039 {
04040     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
04041     return sc_fxval_fast( a.get_val() / b.m_val );
04042 }
04043 
04044 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,int)

04058 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const sc_unsigned&)

04065 
04066 inline
04067 const sc_fxval_fast
04068 operator << ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04069 {
04070     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04071     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( b ) );
04072 }
04073 
04074 inline
04075 const sc_fxval_fast
04076 operator >> ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04077 {
04078     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04079     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( -b ) );
04080 }

04100     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
04101     c.set_val( tmp.get_val() op b.m_val );                                    \
04102 }                                                                             \
04103                                                                               \

04106 fnc ( sc_fxnum_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a, tp b )                        \

04113 }                                                                             \

04120     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \

04122     c.cast();                                                                 \
04123     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                        \
04124 }

04217 void
04218 lshift( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04219 {
04220     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04221     c.set_val( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( b ) );
04222 }
04223 
04224 inline
04225 void
04226 rshift( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04227 {
04228     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04229     c.set_val( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( -b ) );
04230 }
04231 
04232 inline
04233 void
04234 lshift( sc_fxnum_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04235 {
04236     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04237     c.m_val = a.m_val * scfx_pow2( b );
04238     c.cast();
04239     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
04240 }
04241

04243 void
04244 rshift( sc_fxnum_fast& c, const sc_fxnum_fast& a, int b )
04245 {
04246     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04247     c.m_val = a.m_val * scfx_pow2( -b );
04248     c.cast();
04249     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
04250 }

04253 // relational (including equality) operators
04254 
04255 #define DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
04256 inline                                                                        \
04257 bool                                                                          \
04258 operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a, tp b )                                  \
04259 {                                                                             \
04260     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
04261     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
04262     return ( a.m_val op tmp.get_val() );                                      \
04263 }                                                                             \
04264                                                                               \
04265 inline                                                                        \
04266 bool                                                                          \
04267 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxnum_fast& b )                                  \
04268 {                                                                             \
04269     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
04270     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
04271     return ( tmp.get_val() op b.m_val );                                      \
04272 }
04273

04275 #define DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
04276 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,int64)                                                       \

04278 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                          \
04279 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                         \

04282 #else

04284 #endif
04285

04290 {                                                                             \
04291     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
04292     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
04293     return ( a.m_val op b.m_val );                                            \
04294 }                                                                             \
04295                                                                               \

04301     return ( a.m_val op b.get_val() );                                        \
04302 }                                                                             \
04303                                                                               \

04307 {                                                                             \
04308     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
04309     return ( a.get_val() op b.m_val );                                        \
04310 }                                                                             \

04331 
04332 
04333 // assignment operators
04334 
04335 inline
04336 sc_fxnum_fast&
04337 sc_fxnum_fast::operator = ( const sc_fxnum_fast& a )
04338 {
04339     if( &a != this )
04340     {
04341         SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
04342         m_val = a.m_val;
04343         cast();
04344         SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04345     }
04346     return *this;
04347 }
04348 
04349 inline
04350 sc_fxnum_fast&
04351 sc_fxnum_fast::operator = ( const sc_fxval_fast& a )
04352 {
04353     m_val = a.get_val();
04354     cast();
04355     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04356     return *this;
04357 }
04358 
04359 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(tp)                                                     \
04360 inline                                                                        \
04361 sc_fxnum_fast&                                                                \
04362 sc_fxnum_fast::operator = ( tp a )                                            \
04363 {                                                                             \
04364     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
04365     m_val = tmp.get_val();                                                    \
04366     cast();                                                                   \
04367     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
04368     return *this;                                                             \
04369 }
04370 
04371 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int)
04372 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned int)
04373 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(long)
04374 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned long)
04375 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(float)
04376 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(double)
04377 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const char*)
04378 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxval&)
04379 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxnum&)
04380 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
04381 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int64)
04382 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(uint64)
04383 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_int_base&)
04384 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_uint_base&)
04385 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_signed&)
04386 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_unsigned&)
04387 #endif
04388 
04389 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
04390 
04391 
04392 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
04393 inline                                                                        \
04394 sc_fxnum_fast&                                                                \
04395 sc_fxnum_fast::operator op ( tp b )                                           \
04396 {                                                                             \
04397     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                     \
04398     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
04399     m_val op tmp.get_val();                                                   \
04400     cast();                                                                   \
04401     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
04402     return *this;                                                             \
04403 }
04404 
04405 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
04406 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
04407 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,int64)                                                       \
04408 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                      \
04409 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                          \
04410 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                         \
04411 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                            \
04412 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
04413 #else
04414 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
04415 #endif
04416 
04417 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op)                                                       \
04418 inline                                                                        \
04419 sc_fxnum_fast&                                                                \
04420 sc_fxnum_fast::operator op ( const sc_fxnum_fast& b )                         \
04421 {                                                                             \
04422     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                     \
04423     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
04424     m_val op b.m_val;                                                         \
04425     cast();                                                                   \
04426     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
04427     return *this;                                                             \
04428 }                                                                             \
04429                                                                               \
04430 inline                                                                        \
04431 sc_fxnum_fast&                                                                \
04432 sc_fxnum_fast::operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast& b )                         \
04433 {                                                                             \
04434     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                     \
04435     m_val op b.get_val();                                                     \
04436     cast();                                                                   \
04437     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
04438     return *this;                                                             \
04439 }                                                                             \
04440                                                                               \
04441 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,int)                                                         \
04442 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                                \
04443 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,long)                                                        \
04444 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                               \
04445 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,float)                                                      \
04446 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,double)                                                      \
04447 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const char*)                                                 \
04448 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxval&)                                             \
04449 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxnum&)                                             \
04450 DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
04451 
04452 DEFN_ASN_OP(*=)
04453 DEFN_ASN_OP(/=)
04454 DEFN_ASN_OP(+=)
04455 DEFN_ASN_OP(-=)
04456 
04457 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
04458 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER
04459 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP
04460 
04461 
04462 inline
04463 sc_fxnum_fast&
04464 sc_fxnum_fast::operator <<= ( int b )
04465 {
04466     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04467     m_val *= scfx_pow2( b );
04468     cast();
04469     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04470     return *this;
04471 }
04472 
04473 inline
04474 sc_fxnum_fast&
04475 sc_fxnum_fast::operator >>= ( int b )
04476 {
04477     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04478     m_val *= scfx_pow2( -b );
04479     cast();
04480     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04481     return *this;
04482 }
04483 
04484 
04485 // auto-increment and auto-decrement
04486 
04487 inline
04488 const sc_fxval_fast
04489 sc_fxnum_fast::operator ++ ( int )
04490 {
04491     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04492     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04493     double c = m_val;
04494     m_val = m_val + 1;
04495     cast();
04496     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04497     return sc_fxval_fast( c );
04498 }
04499 
04500 inline
04501 const sc_fxval_fast
04502 sc_fxnum_fast::operator -- ( int )
04503 {
04504     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04505     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04506     double c = m_val;
04507     m_val = m_val - 1;
04508     cast();
04509     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04510     return sc_fxval_fast( c );
04511 }
04512 
04513 inline
04514 sc_fxnum_fast&
04515 sc_fxnum_fast::operator ++ ()
04516 {
04517     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04518     m_val = m_val + 1;
04519     cast();
04520     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04521     return *this;
04522 }
04523 
04524 inline
04525 sc_fxnum_fast&
04526 sc_fxnum_fast::operator -- ()
04527 {
04528     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04529     m_val = m_val - 1;
04530     cast();
04531     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04532     return *this;
04533 }

04544                                  i - m_params.fwl() );
04545 }

04582     return sc_fxnum_fast_subref_r( const_cast<sc_fxnum_fast&>( *this ),
04583                                  i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );
04584 }

04592

04594                                  i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );

04600 {

04602     SC_ERROR_IF_( j < 0 || j >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );

04604     return sc_fxnum_fast_subref_r( const_cast<sc_fxnum_fast&>( *this ),
04605                                  i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );
04606 }

04613     SC_ERROR_IF_( j < 0 || j >= m_params.wl(), sc_core::SC_ID_OUT_OF_RANGE_ );

04616                                  i - m_params.fwl(), j - m_params.fwl() );

04666 }

04670 sc_fxnum_fast::to_ushort() const
04671 {

04673     return static_cast<unsigned short>( to_uint64() );
04674 }

04676 inline
04677 int
04678 sc_fxnum_fast::to_int() const
04679 {
04680     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
04681     return static_cast<int>( to_uint64() );
04682 }
04683 
04684 inline
04685 int64
04686 sc_fxnum_fast::to_int64() const
04687 {
04688     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
04689     return static_cast<int64>( to_uint64() );
04690 }
04691 
04692 inline
04693 unsigned int
04694 sc_fxnum_fast::to_uint() const
04695 {
04696     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
04697     return static_cast<unsigned int>( to_uint64() );
04698 }
04699 
04700 inline
04701 uint64
04702 sc_fxnum_fast::to_uint64() const
04703 {
04704     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in is_normal
04705     if (!is_normal())
04706     {
04707         return 0;
04708     }
04709 
04710     int exponent;
04711     double mantissa_dbl = frexp(m_val, &exponent);
04712 
04713     uint64 mantissa = static_cast<uint64>(fabs(mantissa_dbl) * (UINT64_ONE << 53));
04714     exponent -= 53;
04715 
04716     if (!(-64 < exponent && exponent < 64))
04717     {
04718         return 0;
04719     }
04720 
04721     mantissa = exponent >= 0 ? mantissa << exponent : mantissa >> -exponent;
04722     return mantissa_dbl >= 0 ? mantissa : -mantissa;
04723 }
04724 
04725 inline
04726 long
04727 sc_fxnum_fast::to_long() const
04728 {
04729     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
04730     return static_cast<long>( to_uint64() );
04731 }
04732 
04733 inline
04734 unsigned long
04735 sc_fxnum_fast::to_ulong() const
04736 {
04737     // SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
04738     return static_cast<unsigned long>( to_uint64() );
04739 }
04740 
04741 inline
04742 float
04743 sc_fxnum_fast::to_float() const
04744 {
04745     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04746     return static_cast<float>( m_val );
04747 }
04748 
04749 inline
04750 double
04751 sc_fxnum_fast::to_double() const
04752 {
04753     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04754     return m_val;

04758 // query value
04759 
04760 inline
04761 bool
04762 sc_fxnum_fast::is_neg() const
04763 {
04764     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04765     scfx_ieee_double id( m_val );
04766     return ( id.negative() != 0 );
04767 }
04768 
04769 inline
04770 bool
04771 sc_fxnum_fast::is_zero() const
04772 {
04773     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04774     scfx_ieee_double id( m_val );
04775     return id.is_zero();
04776 }
04777 
04778 // internal use only;
04779 inline
04780 bool
04781 sc_fxnum_fast::is_normal() const
04782 {
04783     SC_FXNUM_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
04784     scfx_ieee_double id( m_val );
04785     return ( id.is_normal() || id.is_subnormal() || id.is_zero() );
04786 }
