04893 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
04894 //  CLASS : sc_fxval
04895 //
04896 //  Fixed-point value type; arbitrary precision.
04897 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
04898 
04899 // public constructors
04900 
04901 inline
04902 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( const sc_fxnum& a,
04903                     sc_fxval_observer* observer_ )
04904 : m_rep( new scfx_rep( *a.get_rep() ) ),
04905   m_observer( observer_ )
04906 {
04907     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
04908     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
04909     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04910 }
04911 
04912 inline
04913 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( const sc_fxnum_fast& a,
04914                     sc_fxval_observer* observer_ )
04915 : m_rep( new scfx_rep( a.to_double() ) ),
04916   m_observer( observer_ )
04917 {
04918     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
04919     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
04920     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
04921 }
04922 
04923 
04924 // binary operators
04925 
04926 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
04927 inline                                                                        \
04928 const sc_fxval                                                                \
04929 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, tp b )                                       \
04930 {                                                                             \
04931     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
04932     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
04933     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep ) );      \
04934 }                                                                             \
04935                                                                               \
04936 inline                                                                        \
04937 const sc_fxval                                                                \
04938 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                       \
04939 {                                                                             \
04940     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
04941     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
04942     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );      \
04943 }
04944 
04945 #define DEFN_BIN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
04946 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
04947 
04948 DEFN_BIN_OP(*,mult)
04949 DEFN_BIN_OP(+,add)
04950 DEFN_BIN_OP(-,sub)
04951 //DEFN_BIN_OP(/,div)
04952 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
04953 
04954 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_T
04955 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP
04956 
04957 
04958 // binary functions
04959 
04960 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,tp)                                                \
04961 inline                                                                        \
04962 void                                                                          \
04963 fnc ( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxval& a, tp b )                                  \
04964 {                                                                             \
04965     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
04966     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
04967     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
04968     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );               \
04969     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
04970 }                                                                             \
04971                                                                               \
04972 inline                                                                        \
04973 void                                                                          \
04974 fnc ( sc_fxval& c, tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                  \
04975 {                                                                             \
04976     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
04977     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
04978     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
04979     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep );               \
04980     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
04981 }
04982 
04983 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC(fnc)                                                     \
04984 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
04985 
04986 DEFN_BIN_FNC(mult)
04987 DEFN_BIN_FNC(div)
04988 DEFN_BIN_FNC(add)
04989 DEFN_BIN_FNC(sub)
04990 
04991 #undef DEFN_BIN_FNC_T
04992 #undef DEFN_BIN_FNC
04993 
04994 
04995 // relational (including equality) operators
04996 
04997 #define DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,tp)                                              \
04998 inline                                                                        \
04999 bool                                                                          \
05000 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, tp b )                                       \
05001 {                                                                             \
05002     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
05003     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
05004     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );                \
05005     return ( ret );                                                           \
05006 }                                                                             \
05007                                                                               \
05008 inline                                                                        \
05009 bool                                                                          \
05010 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                       \
05011 {                                                                             \
05012     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
05013     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
05014     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep );                \
05015     return ( ret );                                                           \
05016 }
05017 
05018 
05019 #define DEFN_REL_OP(op,ret)                                                   \
05020 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
05021 
05022 DEFN_REL_OP(<,result < 0)
05023 DEFN_REL_OP(<=,result <= 0)
05024 DEFN_REL_OP(>,result > 0 && result != 2)
05025 DEFN_REL_OP(>=,result >= 0 && result != 2)
05026 DEFN_REL_OP(==,result == 0)
05027 DEFN_REL_OP(!=,result != 0)
05028 
05029 #undef DEFN_REL_OP_T
05030 #undef DEFN_REL_OP
05031 
05032 
05033 // assignment operators
05034 
05035 inline
05036 sc_fxval&
05037 sc_fxval::operator = ( const sc_fxnum& a )
05038 {
05039     *m_rep = *a.get_rep();
05040     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
05041     return *this;
05042 }
05043 
05044 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(tp)                                                     \
05045 inline                                                                        \
05046 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
05047 sc_fxval::operator = ( tp b )                                                 \
05048 {                                                                             \
05049     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
05050     *m_rep = *tmp.m_rep;                                                      \
05051     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
05052     return *this;                                                             \
05053 }
05054 
05055 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxnum_fast&)
05056 
05057 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
05058 
05059 
05060 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
05061 inline                                                                        \
05062 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
05063 sc_fxval::operator op ( tp b )                                                \
05064 {                                                                             \
05065     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
05066     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
05067     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );       \
05068     delete m_rep;                                                             \
05069     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
05070     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
05071     return *this;                                                             \
05072 }
05073 
05074 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
05075 inline                                                                        \
05076 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
05077 sc_fxval::operator op ( const sc_fxnum& b )                                   \
05078 {                                                                             \
05079     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
05080     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *b.get_rep() );     \
05081     delete m_rep;                                                             \
05082     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
05083     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
05084     return *this;                                                             \
05085 }                                                                             \
05086                                                                               \
05087 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxnum_fast&)
05088 
05089 DEFN_ASN_OP(*=,mult)
05090 DEFN_ASN_OP(/=,div)
05091 DEFN_ASN_OP(+=,add)

05131 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,op,tp)                                             \
05132 inline                                                                        \
05133 void                                                                          \
05134 fnc ( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxval_fast& a, tp b )                        \
05135 {                                                                             \
05136     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
05137     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
05138     c.m_val = a.m_val op tmp.m_val;                                           \
05139     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                        \
05140 }                                                                             \
05141                                                                               \

05145 {                                                                             \
05146     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
05147     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
05148     c.m_val = tmp.m_val op b.m_val;                                           \
05149     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                        \
05150 }
